description._content: Description: Beginning of the North Coast Road, traced by the Public Works Officers. It will be nearly 5 miles long and will cost just over Rs.27,000. Location: Seychelles Date: 1890-1909 Description: Beginning of the North Coast Road, another view, showing some of the boulders which are met with and have to be "treated." The track is comparatively an easy one. Location: Seychelles Date: 1890-1909 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/770 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
